ygData.subject: Re: Pets
ygData.msgSnippet: Great idea. No balance change more than that SKs can use their pets in dungeouns.
ygData.messageBody:
Great idea. No balance change more than that SKs can use their pets in
dungeouns.

Howard Chan wrote:

> What needs to be done, however, is to make the mobs' agressiveness to
> your pet dependent upon the SK's con. -----Original Message-----
> From: Michael Wooldirdge <dark@...>
> To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com <eq_shadowknights@onelist.com>
> Date: Monday, July 05, 1999 11:33 AM
> Subject: Re: [eq_shadowknights] Pets
>
>
> ShadowKnight pets are not going to be improved anymore and
> for good reason. You increase them anymore and your really
> beginning to come out of the Shadow Knight spells and move
> into the Necromancer spells. If you wanted powerful pets
> then you should of been a Necromancer. ShadowKnights are 3/4
> warrior and 1/4 Necromancer not the other way around. Your
> spells are used as support nothing more.
>
